thread.section_title: Hilton London Angel Islington - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Large room, great service
thread.title_full: Large room, great service - Review of Hilton London Angel Islington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Helios5000
title: Large room, great service
text:
We stayed here for two nights. Our room was very large for London, and although "corporate" was very smart. The bed was very comfy and the shower excellent.
Breakfast was a buffet with a large amount of choice. The staff were all charming.
Good value for where it is and if we're in the area again we shall return.
